ComicInfo.Title: Skanks, Shanks and Shackles Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
Illegally incarcerated and held prisoner by a giant monster of a warden, Janey discovers more secrets about her past, while trying to bust her father out and take down a few assholes in the process. Get ready for Part 2 of Skanks, Shanks, and Shackles.
Features a risqué variant, plus limited edition (Marcelo Trom) and artist (Hyde Chang) variants and risqué variants.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Dan Mendoza | 1 | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Hyde Chang | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Hyde Chang | 4 | E | Limited Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Trom | 5 | F | Limited Edition Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marcelo Trom | 6 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 20:30:50. [CVDB550379]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dan Mendoza, Hyde Chang, Marcelo Trom
ComicInfo.Characters: Chuck Busey, Fester Chance, Herald Belle, Janey Belle, Ted Chance, Jr., Trish
